Package codenames

Class BoardController

java.lang.Object
codenames.BoardController
@RestController public class BoardController extends Object
Controller that interacts with Entity Game Only interacts with active games and their game play functions.

  • Method Details

    • receiveCurrentClue

      @PutMapping(path="/games/{id}/clue/{clue}/{numGuesses}") @ResponseBody String receiveCurrentClue(@PathVariable int id, @PathVariable String clue, @PathVariable int numGuesses, @RequestBody Player player)
      Send a clue to a game board
      Parameters:
      id - game id
      clue - string of single line clue
      numGuesses - the number of cards this applies to
      player - player that is sending request
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • receiveGuess

      @PutMapping(path="/games/{id}/guess/{card_position}") @ResponseBody String receiveGuess(@PathVariable int id, @PathVariable int card_position, @RequestBody Player player)
      Send a guess to reveal a card on a board
      Parameters:
      id - game id
      card_position - position of card on board (0-24)
      player - player sending request
      Returns:
      success or fail message

    • genWords

      @GetMapping(path="/games/{id}/generatewords") String genWords(@PathVariable int id)
      Adds 25 words from word list to game object
      Parameters:
      id - ID of game in repository
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • generateGameCards

      @GetMapping(path="/games/{id}/generatestates") String generateGameCards(@PathVariable int id)
      Generate the GameCard array for 25 cards in an array in reference to word list.
      Parameters:
      id - game id
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • generateWordsAndStates

      @GetMapping(path="games/{id}/generateboard") String generateWordsAndStates(@PathVariable int id)
      Generate both words and game card states in one method
      Parameters:
      id - game id
      Returns:
      result message (ex. success)

    • getGameStatus

      @GetMapping(path="/games/{id}/getboard") String getGameStatus(@PathVariable int id)
      Method to get status of board Used by frontend to refresh game

    • getWords

      @GetMapping(path="/games/{id}/words") String getWords(@PathVariable int id)

      Parameters:
      id - game id
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • getColors

      @GetMapping(path="/games/{id}/colors") String getColors(@PathVariable int id)
      Get list of colors (25) of a certain game Used to refresh view colors
      Parameters:
      id - game id
      Returns:
      list of each card's color

    • getRevealed

      @GetMapping(path="/games/{id}/isrevealed") String getRevealed(@PathVariable int id)

      Parameters:
      id - game id
      Returns:
      list of cards' revealed status
